songs.title: Based (DP Beats Version)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Haha, it's DP on the beat
Gang
You know how we rock, nigga
Based World shit

[Hook]
Bitch, I am Lil' Tay-K and I'm back on my bullshit (Tay-K)
I'm with Keyboard Kid, yeah, Based World, he's a cool kid (Based World)
Run up on Lil' Tay-K, nigga, you gon' catch a full clip (lil' bih)
Bitch I got that chopper, I am not afraid to pull it (chop, chop)
I had your bitch sucking dick, yeah that bitch was drooling (top, top)
And she cannot fuck with it, I can't fuck with coo (gang)
I can't fuck with niggas that be Bloods, bitch I'm Coolin' (gang, bitch)
I can't fuck with niggas but my Cuz, cause I'm Coolin' (gang)
I can't fuck with her 'less she got a bag I could put my tool in (bitch where yo' bag?)
I can't fuck with her 'less she got a dad that I can cool with (bitch where yo' dad at?)

[Verse]
I can't cuddle with no thot, I can't do no spoonin'
I could pull her hair, but, that's all that I'm doin' (don't)
Bitch, I got this .45, it's 12 inches, so I'm rulin' (grrah)
Nigga I'm runnin' from the po-po, I got yo' bitch movin' (skrt, skrt)
Shittin' on yo' nigga, he is broke so I'm poopin' (lil' bitch)
Your bitch suck my dick, swear to god she is not human
Bitch I got on Gosha undercover, I'm amusin' (swag)
Better go with the motion, gotta go dat way, I'm movin' (baow)

[Hook]
Bitch, I am Lil' Tay-K and I'm back on my bullshit (Tay-K)
I'm with Keyboard Kid, yeah, Based World, he's a cool kid (Based World)
Run up on Lil' Tay-K, nigga, you gon' catch a full clip (lil' bih)
Bitch I got that chopper, I am not afraid to pull it (chop, chop)
I had your bitch sucking dick, yeah that bitch was drooling (top, top)
And she cannot fuck with it, I can't fuck with coo (gang)
I can't fuck with niggas that be Bloods, bitch I'm Coolin' (gang, bitch)
I can't fuck with niggas but my Cuz, cause I'm Coolin' (gang)
I can't fuck with her 'less she got a bag I could put my tool in (bitch where yo' bag?)
(Bitch where yo' dad at? Haha)

[Outro]
Haha, It's DP on the beat!
